property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1. When Master of Waves enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/0 blue Elemental creature tokens equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may want to hold your breath." - Kellyg, merrow aquitect

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The treasure in my mind is greater than any worldly glory."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return to their owners' hands all creatures with toughness less than or equal to the number of Islands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The tides have begun to ignore the moon." - Tamiyo's journal

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you attempt to pull from the aether, I can spread onto the wind." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may cast Harbinger of the Tides as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.) When Harbinger of the Tides enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) When Inkfathom Divers enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the land dwellers know the coast is no longer the border between our realms. A new age of empire has begun."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. {T}: Target Merfolk creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be like the sea: flow around that which is unmovable; for everything else, crash into it unrelentingly."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Merfolk Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all Island cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, you may tap or untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Steady and silent as the deep current, the reejerey guides the course of the school.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fragments of thought refract and multiply, surging in a geyser of dizzying insight.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Change the target of target spell with a single target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Rootwater Hunter deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bitter water, vicious wave; Shadow-cold shallows, root-made maze. Home's angry embrace." - Rootwater Saga

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kapsho merfolk have infiltrated fortresses as remote as the desert citadel in Sunari in their relentless quest for arcane knowledge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target Merfolk creature gets +1/+1 and gains islandwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target land becomes an Island until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tide of battle favors those who can swim.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create a 5/5 blue Wall creature token with defender. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The floor of the sea is paved with the shattered remnants of vessels that navigated its surface unwelcomed." - Thassa, god of the sea

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tidebinder Mage enters the battlefield, tap target red or green creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Tidebinder Mage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +0/+3 until end of turn. Untap those creatures. At this turn's next end of combat, tap each creature that was blocked by one of those creatures this turn and it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a permanent you control becomes untapped, Wake Thrasher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Anyone who thinks merrows have more brains than brawn has never been run over by one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Whenever Cold-Eyed Selkie deals combat damage to a player, you may draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She follows the old tributaries built when merrows still shaped the tides.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {5}{U}, {T}, Sacrifice Blighted Cataract: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once, water ran here. Now only dust and ash fall from the clifftops.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Whenever Warren Instigator deals damage to an opponent, you may put a Goblin creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a rabble to be roused.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Battle Squadron's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The goblins made an unruly pile with military precision.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has the biggest bashing stick, so it's a safe bet he's the leader.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not the size of the rock. It's how badly you want to lift it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. (They deal both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice Ember Hauler: It deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flurk's crude goblin language didn't differentiate between "I bring the flame" and "I am the flame."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Foundry Street riot, Arrester Hulbein tried to ban bludgeons. Which, inevitably, resulted in another riot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ghostfire is colorless. Ghostfire deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only those gifted with the eye of Ugin, the spirit dragon, can see his fiery breath.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Other Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 and have haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Each creature attacks this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you need to convey that special kind of message.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Renown 1 (When this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.) As long as Goblin Glory Chaser is renowned, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player. Goblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin. Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't underestimate the aerodynamic qualities of the common goblin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Goblin creatures you control attack each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners. At the beginning of your end step, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Finding themselves in a new and unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) When Goblin Ringleader enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Goblin cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.value: "A true warrior fights with whatever's handy." - Qerk of the Secret Warren

property.value: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins are eager to follow orders, especially when those orders involve stealing, hurting, annoying, eating, destroying, or swearing.

property.value: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

property.value: Tarfire deals 2 damage to any target.

property.value: "After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious." - A tale of Auntie Grub

property.value: "In my early experiments in phylactery, I found that fragile forms have their uses." - Rocati, Duke of Martyne

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}, {T}: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Goblin Charbelcher deals damage equal to the number of nonland cards revealed this way to any target. If the revealed land card was a Mountain, Goblin Charbelcher deals double that damage instead. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.
